details: Led a team of 5 engineers in developing cloud-based applications using Node.js and AWS.
Architected a scalable microservices platform that handled over 1 million API requests per day.
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews to ensure best practices.
Developed front-end applications using Angular and connected them to RESTful APIs.
Integrated Elasticsearch to build a powerful search functionality for an e-commerce platform.
Collaborated with UX/UI designers to build responsive and user-friendly web pages.
